Can - Class in com.perisic.beds
 
Can() - Constructor for class com.perisic.beds.Can
This is the default constructor of the Can class Value is a variable in the super class DepositItem
checkmachine() - Method in class com.perisic.beds.CustomerPanel
A method to check the status of the machine, also it accepts and calls the method from DepositItemReceiver class receiver variable is used to initiate the call Implementation of this checkmachine method is in DepositItemReceiver class
checkmachinestatus() - Method in class com.perisic.beds.DepositItemReceiver
This indicates whether more items can be added to the machine This method will be called in CustomerPanel using an object of this class
classifyItem(int) - Method in class com.perisic.beds.DepositItemReceiver
 
cleanmethod() - Method in class com.perisic.beds.CustomerPanel
This method will clear the items from the machine This method accepts and calls the machineClear method in DepositItemReceiver Receiver variable is used to initiate the call
clearrecyclingmachine() - Method in class com.perisic.beds.DepositItemReceiver
A method to call the machineclean method of the ReceiptBasis class theReceiptBasis variable of ReceiptBasis class is used to call the method implementation of machineclean method is in the ReceiptBasis
com.perisic.beds - package com.perisic.beds
 
computeSum() - Method in class com.perisic.beds.ReceiptBasis
This method calculates the total value of each items and the total count of each items this method will be called in printReceipt method in DepositItemReceiver class the class name is derived by using getsimplename
